data.title: Strategy is Different in Service Businesses
data.meta_description: Many managers of service businesses are aware that the strategic management (by which I mean the total process of selecting and implementing a corporate strategy) of service businesses is different from that of manufacturing businesses. This article discusses how pure service businesses are different from product-oriented businesses and why they require different strategic thinking. A […]
data.text:
DT

Mr. Thomas is assistant professor of business administration at the Harvard Business School.
